Journalism, Communication & PR

Even though social media, civil journalism, and now AI challenge traditional journalism, the field hasn’t yet lost its importance for any society’s welfare. Yet communication and PR in intersection with journalism remain as an valuable sector where parts may communicate in masse.

Professional Project

Aziza Kultaeva raised International Journalism graduates’ occupation obstacles issue for her master’s project. Journalism is one of the unprivileged majors compare to STEM professions which barely can hire immigrant professionals.

Language Learning

Even if post-Soviet nationals seem being advantaged to speak two languages, mother tongue and Russian, they are striving to learn other international languages such as English. However, it doesn’t work out easily, especially if they are not teenagers or adolescents. So how you can help yourself?
